subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Still reeling from a first-round playoff exit, Dirk Nowitzki said that he needed some time before deciding whether to return to the Mavericks or to opt out of his contract and become a free agent.
snippet: Still reeling from a first-round playoff exit, Dirk Nowitzki said that he needed some time before deciding whether to return to the Mavericks or to opt out of his contract and become a free agent.
